title: [娱乐|机制]ExtractEXP —— 把等级经验存起来Py交易吧！[1.8-1.10]
author: x240295600
txt_content:
非常实用的插件，赞
评个分吧老铁

replies.author: x240295600
replies.txt_content:
标题: [娱乐|机制]ExtractEXP —— 把等级经验存起来Py交易吧！[1.8-1.10] 本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-16 17:46 编辑 


————————————————————————————————————————————————————
简介：ExtractEXP插件可以让玩家把等级存到指定的一个物品里随时可以使用，这可以让玩家们互相交易（233）,版本：1.8，1.9，1.10
———————————————————————————————————————————
安装：只需将插件文件放入plugins 文件夹，然后重新启动服务器就可以使用该插件。
———————————————————————————————————————————
命令and权限：/exp：基础命令，显示该插件参数。权限：无
/exp create [经验]：创建一个经验瓶，添上你要存的等级。权限：extractexp.create
/exp redeem：使用手中的经验瓶权限：extractexp.redeem（如果配置文件中的“auto-redeem”设置为“true”，直接右键就可以使用。）


/exp stack：把大小不一的经验瓶整合到一起，每个瓶子装的有限，看不懂这句的服主可以自己操作一下就懂了。权限：extractexp.stack

/exp giveto [player] [levels]：给指定玩家一个经验瓶，后台也可以执行此命令。权限：extractexp.giveto
/exp reload：重载插件权限：extractexp.reload

配置文件# Configuration file for ExtractEXP, created by Creepah.
# Default config is available on resource page if you break the syntax by accident.
# NOTE: All instances of [levels] in formats will be replaced with a relevant number of levels.

# The formats of messages sent by the plugin.no-perm: "&cYou do not have permission to perform this command!"created: "&aAn experience item with [levels] levels has been given to you!"redeemed: "&aYou have redeemed [levels] levels from an experience item!"given: "&aYou have given [player] an experience item with [levels] levels!"received: "&aYou have received an experience item with [levels] levels!"stacked: "&aYou have stacked a total of [levels] levels into [count] items!"
# Format of the title of a created experience item.title: "&2[levels] EXP Levels"
# The item type of the experience item levels will be stored in.# NOTE: Specified item must be correct to the material's name in the following list:# https://hub.spigotmc.org/javadocs/spigot/org/bukkit/Material.html# 设置经验瓶材质，默认玻璃瓶.material: glass_bottle
# 经验瓶最大能存储的等级.max-levels: 50
#如果为true，直接右键使用经验瓶.auto-redeem: false

效果图：




更多：存储的等级写在经验瓶第一行lore上你可以修改lore达到自己的目的233，注意格式。给人气不扣自己的人气，觉得插件对你有帮助那就给个人气吧，需要的话我会发汉化也没两个字。
